Rodimus stood carrying Elita in his arms, showing a surpris=
ing amount
of energy for a bot who had just a few minutes earlier been in a=
 deep
life threatening coma. "Young one." he said, talking to Elita, his
vo=
ice dropping for her ears only, "we grown ups have a few things to
discuss.=
 Go keep an eye on mommy until I get there." His was the voice
of a loving =
father, a mixture of both authority and affection. There
was so much going =
on and they had to get it all out in the open before
things progressed too =
far.

Torca the leader and general of the Maximal Fuzors also stepped into

is head barely missed the cieling as he ducked down slightly to
come throug=
h the doorway. He looked around his optics softening
slightly as he saw for=

"Yes indeed we do have much to discuss." =
his deep voice boomed across
the room. He looked at Perceptor for a long mo=
ment as if he were about
to send him out of the room, but then he just turn=
ed his massive head
to peer at Rodimus and then Tuscon, "And then I am sure=

will need your rest."
